data.name: policy_description
data.value: Use this page to change the policy settings.

data.name: policy_blockupdates
data.value: You cannot change policy settings for this content type because it inherited the settings from its parent content type or a site level content type. To change these policy settings, change the settings for the parent of this content type.

data.name: policy_blockupdates_ro_ct
data.value: The policy settings for this content type cannot be changed. This content type may be read-only, or content type management may not be allowed for this list.

data.name: policy_blockupdates_builtin_ct
data.value: You cannot specify an information management policy for a core content type. Create a new content type that is derived from the core content type, and then apply the policy to the new content type.

data.name: policy_blockglobalpolicies
data.value: You cannot use a site collection policy on the Document or Item content type. Instead, define a custom policy.

data.name: policy_select_description
data.value: Specify the information management policy for this content type. If you would like to use one of this site's predefined policies then select "Use a site policy". Alternatively, you can directly create or edit the policy settings.

data.name: policy_nocontenttype
data.value: Cannot set an information management policy on a list without at least one valid content type.

data.name: policycts_description_dl
data.value: Use this page to manage the information policies on each content type in this library

data.name: policycts_description_list
data.value: Use this page to manage the information policies on each content type in this list

data.name: policylistcts_description_dl
data.value: Use this page to configure hierarchial, folder based retention schedules and to manage information policies on each content type in this library.

data.name: policylistcts_description_list
data.value: Use this page to configure hierarchial, folder based retention schedules and to manage information policies on each content type in this list.

data.name: policycts_policydescription_dl
data.value: By default, a library will enforce the retention schedule set on its content types. Alternatively you can stop enforcing content type schedules and instead define schedules on the library and its folders.

data.name: policycts_policydescription_list
data.value: By default, a list will enforce the retention schedule set on its content types. Alternatively you can stop enforcing content type schedules and instead define schedules on the list and its folders.

data.name: policycts_ctpolicydescription_dl
data.value: This table shows all the content types for this library, along with the policies and expiration schedules for each type. To modify the policy for a content type, click its name.

data.name: policycts_ctpolicydescription_list
data.value: This table shows all the content types for this list, along with the policies and expiration schedules for each type. To modify the policy for a content type, click its name.

data.name: policycts_ctpolicy_tablesummary
data.value: This table shows all the content types for this list, along with the policy descriptions and expiration schedules for each type.

data.name: policyedit_name_and_description_long
data.value: The name and administrative description are shown to list managers when configuring policies on a list or content type.

data.name: policyedit_statement_long
data.value: The policy statement is displayed to end users when they open items subject to this policy. The policy statement can explain which policies apply to the content or indicate any special handling or information that users need to be aware of.

data.name: policyedit_name_empty_error
data.value: You must specify a name for the policy.

data.name: policylist_page_description
data.value: Use this page to create and modify information management policies on this site collection.

data.name: policylist_button_createnew_tooltip
data.value: Create a new Site Collection Policy

data.name: exportpolicy_description
data.value: The Site Collection Policy is being exported.

data.name: importpolicy_description

data.name: importpolicy_invalidmanifest
data.value: The file provided is not a valid policy manifest.

data.name: expiration_stage_desc

data.name: expiration_stagedesc_Event
data.value: Specify what causes the stage to activate:

data.value: This stage will execute once according to the event defined above. Use recurrence to force the stage to repeat its action.

data.name: expiration_period
data.value: Specify a predefined formula for this stage to trigger

data.name: expiration_formula_builtin
data.value: This stage is based off a date property on the item

data.name: expiration_formula_builtin_tip

data.name: expiration_formula_workflow
data.value: This stage is set by an external event (for example, by a workflow)

data.name: expiration_formula_workflow_tip
data.value: The retention period is: Set programmatically (for example, by a workflow).

data.name: expiration_formula_custom
data.value: Set by a custom retention formula installed on this server:

data.value: The retention period is: Set by a custom retention formula installed on this server.

data.name: expiration_days_validation

data.name: expiration_months_validation
data.value: Number of months must be between 0 and 6000.

data.name: expiration_years_validation
data.value: Number of years must be between 0 and 500.

data.name: expiration_numeric_validation
data.value: Only positive integer values are supported.

data.name: expiration_actionselection_validation
data.value: Please specify what to do when an item expires.

data.name: expiration_actiondesc_recycle
data.value: This action will move the item to the site collection recycle bin.

data.name: expiration_actionerr_recycle
data.value: The Recycle Bin is disabled in this site. Select another action.

data.name: expiration_actiondesc_delete
data.value: This action will delete the item without sending it to the Recycle Bin.

data.name: expiration_actionserr1_transfer
data.value: Pages cannot be transferred to another site. Select another action.

data.name: expiration_actionserr2_transfer
data.value: There are no registered destination locations for this site. Select another action.

data.name: expiration_actiondesc_skip
data.value: This action does not modify the item, but it will cause the item to proceed to the next retention stage.

data.name: expiration_actiondesc_record
data.value: This action will declare the item as a record. If there is a different retention policy defined for records, the item will begin to execute the record policy.

data.name: expiration_actionerr_record
data.value: The In Place Records feature is disabled in this site. Select another action.

data.name: expiration_actiondesc_deletepreviousdrafts
data.value: This action will delete all previous drafts of this document.

data.name: expiration_actiondesc_deletepreviousversions
data.value: This action will delete all previous versions of this document.

data.name: expiration_actionserr1_wf
data.value: Workflows cannot be triggered in site collection policies. Create a retention schedule on a list or content type to schedule a workflow.

data.name: expiration_actionserr2_wf
data.value: There are no workflows associated with this list. Select another action.

data.name: expiration_actionserr3_wf
data.value: There are no workflows associated with this content type. Select another action.

data.name: auditcustquery_eventsDescription
data.value: Specify whether this report should be restricted to particular events. If no event filters are specified, the report will include all events matching the other restrictions.

data.name: auditcustquery_locationDescription
data.value: Specify whether this report should be restricted to a particular list in this Site Collection.

data.name: auditcustquery_datesDescription
data.value: Specify a start date and/or end date that this report should be restricted to. If you specify only a start date, the report will include all events that occur after that date. If you specify only an end date, the report will include all events that occur before that date.

data.name: auditcustquery_userDescription
data.value: Specify which user this report should be restricted to.

data.name: auditshared_EventCheckInOut

data.name: auditshared_EventAuditChange

data.value: Specify the events that should be audited for documents and items within this site collection.

data.name: auditsettings_lists_description
data.value: Specify the events that should be audited for lists, libraries, and sites within this site collection.

data.name: auditsettings_trimming_description

data.name: editrule_rulepriority_inactivebutton
data.value: Inactive (will not run on incoming content)

data.name: editrule_ruleconditions_wildcharalias
data.value: Note: Adding the type "*" will allow documents of unknown content types to be organized by this rule.

data.name: editrule_ruletargetlocation_autocreatefolderscheckbox
data.value: Automatically create a folder for each unique value of a property:

data.name: editrule_ruletargetlocation_autocreatefoldersselectproperty
data.value: Select a property (must be a required, single value property):

data.name: editrule_ruletargetlocation_autocreatefoldersnameformat
data.value: Specify the format for the folder name:

data.name: editrule_ruletargetlocation_autocreatefolderspostinfo
data.value:
When the folder is created:
%1 will be replaced by the name of the property
%2 will be replaced with the unique value for the property

data.name: editrule_ruletargetlocation_autocreatefoldererror
data.value: Folder name format contains some invalid characters

data.name: editrule_ruletargetlocation_externalrouter
data.value: Another content organizer in a different site:

data.name: editrule_ruletargetlocation_localrouter
data.value: A library or folder in this site:

data.name: editrule_rulecontenttype_aliascheckbox
data.value: This content type has alternate names in other sites:

data.name: editrule_rulename_description
data.value: Describe the conditions and actions of this rule. The rule name is used in reports about the content of this site, such as a library's File Plan Report.

data.name: editrule_rulepriority_description
data.value: Specify whether this rule should run on incoming documents and what the rule's priority is. If a submission matches multiple rules, the router will choose the rule with the higher priority.

data.name: editrule_rulecontenttype_description
data.value: By selecting a content type, you are determining the properties that can be used in the conditions of this rule. In addition, submissions that match this rule will receive the content type selected here when they are placed in a target location.

data.name: editrule_ruleconditions_description
data.value: In order to match this rule, a submission's properties must match all the specified property conditions (e.g. "If Date Created is before 1/1/2000").

data.name: editrule_ruletargetlocation_description
data.value:
Specify where to place content that matches this rule.
When sending to another site, the available sites are taken from the list of other sites with content organizers, as defined by the system administrator.

Check the "Automatically create a folder for each unique value of a property" box to force the organizer to group similar documents together. For instance, if you have a property that lists all the teams in your organization, you can force the organizer to create a separate folder for each team.

data.name: editrule_rulecustomrouter_description
data.value: A custom router allows the router to perform special processing when a document matches a rule.

data.name: editrule_pagedescription
data.value: Use this page to create a new rule. A rule consists of a set of conditions that determine what documents match the rule, as well as a set of actions to take when an incoming document matches the conditions.

data.name: editrule_disabledpageroutewarning
data.value: Pages cannot be sent to external sites.

data.name: expiration_cb_recur
data.value: Repeat this stage's action until the next stage is activated

data.name: expiration_recur_text
data.value: After the stage is first triggered, the stage's action will recur forever until the next stage is triggered.

data.name: expiration_sendtoaction_link_tip
data.value: Move this item to location and leave a link

data.name: policyconfig_description_lb
data.value:
Specify a retention schedule for items in this library. By default, all folders in this library will inherit the library's schedule. However, folders can override the library and define a unique schedule.

A File Plan Report rolls up the retention schedules for a library and all its folders into one document. Generate a File Plan Report for this library...

data.name: policyconfig_description_list
data.value:
Specify a retention schedule for items in this list. By default, all folders in this list will inherit the list's schedule. However, folders can override the list and define a unique schedule.

A File Plan Report rolls up the retention schedules for a list and all its folders into one document. Generate a File Plan Report for this library...

data.name: policyconfig_description_folder
data.value:
Specify a retention schedule for items in this folder. By default, all subfolders in this folder will inherit the folder's schedule. However, subfolders can override the folder and define a unique schedule.

A File Plan Report rolls up the retention schedules for a library and all its folders into one document. Generate a File Plan Report for this library...

data.name: policyedit_chkbox_label
data.value: Define a schedule for this library

data.name: policyedit_title_lb
data.value: Edit Policy: Library Based Retention Schedule

data.name: policyedit_title_list
data.value: Edit Policy: List Based Retention Schedule

data.name: policyedit_title_folder
data.value: Edit Policy: Folder Based Retention Schedule

data.name: policyedit_confirmsrc_lb
data.value: When library and folder based retention schedules are used, all content type retention schedules are ignored. You may be overwriting policies defined by your site administrator.

data.name: policyedit_confirmsrc_list
data.value: When list and folder based retention schedules are used, all content type retention schedules are ignored. You may be overwriting policies defined by your site administrator.

data.name: policyedit_confirmsrc_ct
data.value: When content type based retention schedules are used, any existing library or folder based schedules are ignored.

data.value: Change source or configure list schedule

data.name: policycts_locationbased_warning_lb

data.name: policycts_locationbased_warning_list
data.value: *Note: Since this list is using list and folder retention, all documents will use those schedules. Content type retention policies are ignored.

data.name: expiration_dd_description_text
data.value: Enter a description for this retention schedule

data.name: expiration_dd_description_tip
data.value: Use this textbox to enter a description for this retention schedule

data.name: expirationdetails_desc
data.value: Use this dialog to determine what retention stage an item is in. You can also take action to keep this item in compliance with organizational policy.

data.name: policycts_definerecdschedule
data.value: Define different retention stages for records:

data.name: policycts_inheritschedule
data.value: Inherit retention schedule from parent library or folder

data.name: policycts_items_schedule_title1
data.value: Specify how to manage retention on items that have not been declared records:

data.name: policycts_records_schedule_title
data.value: Specify how to manage retention on records:

data.name: policycts_records_schedule_title1
data.value: Note: You can specify a different policy that applies once an item has been declared a record.

data.name: policycts_shareschedule
data.value: Use the same retention policy as non-records

data.name: policyedit_define_label
data.value: Define a schedule for this folder

data.name: policyedit_define_tooltip
data.value: Select button to define a unique schedule

data.name: policyedit_inherit_tooltip
data.value: Select button to inherit schedule from parent

data.name: policyedit_share_tooltip
data.value: Select button to share schedule as non-records

data.name: policyedit_void_tooltip
data.value: Select radio button to prevent expiring items in this folder

data.name: policy_expconfig_src_desc_lb
data.value:
Configure how items in this library receive a retention schedule. Select Content Types if this site uses retention schedules on site level content types. This will ensure that this library complies with the site's information policy.

Alternatively, select Library and Folders if you want to define schedules on the library and its folders. Those schedules will be enforced regardless of any schedules defined on the content types.

data.name: retentionstages_nodata
data.value: This item is not subject to a retention policy

data.name: itemexpiration_hold_unavailable
data.value: You cannot add/remove item from hold.

data.name: itemexpiration_exempt_confirmation
data.value: Exempting an item from policy will suspend any retention policy that the item might be subject to.

data.name: itemexpiration_unexempt_confirmation
data.value: You are about to remove a policy exemption for this item. This will enable any retention policy the item may be subject to.

data.name: itemexpiration_exempt_unavailable
data.value: You cannot exempt/unexempt item from policy.

data.name: itemexpiration_rcd_unavailable
data.value: You cannot declare/undeclare item as a record.

data.name: itemexpiration_recd_confirmation
data.value: This will lock down the item for editing. Continue?

data.name: itemexpiration_recd_confirmation_delete_only
data.value: This will lock down the item for deleting. Continue?

data.name: itemexpiration_recd_confirmation_no_restriction
data.value: This will declare the item as a record. Continue?

data.name: itemexpiration_recd_confirmation_undeclare_not_available
data.value: The item cannot be undeclared as a record because record undeclaration is not available at this location.

data.name: itemexpiration_notrecd_confirmation
data.value: Item will no longer be a record. Continue?

data.name: expirationconfigerror_listpolicydisallowed
data.value:
This library is configured to enforce content type retention schedules.

To define a schedule on a folder, first enable Library and Folder schedules on the library's settings page: {0}

data.name: expirationconfigerrorListNotFound
data.value: List id was not provided or was invalid

data.name: expirationconfigerrorDocsetBlocked
data.value: Folder-based retention settings can not be configured for Document Sets. To configure settings for a Document Set, go to the settings page for the Document Set content type.

data.name: documentroutersettings_pagedescription
data.value: Use this page to configure this site's content organizer. To create new rules for how content is organized when submitted to this site, visit the Rules list.

data.name: documentroutersettings_versioning_description
data.value:
Specify what should occur when a file with the same name already exists in a target location.
If versioning is not enabled in a target library, the organizer will append unique characters to duplicate submissions regardless of the setting selected here.

data.name: documentroutersettings_versioning_uniqcharsbutton
data.value: Append unique characters to the end of duplicate filenames

data.name: documentroutersettings_routerowners_description
data.value:
Specify the users who manage the rules and can respond when incoming content doesn't match any rule.

Rule Managers must have the Manage Web Site permission to access the content organizer rules list from the site settings page.

data.name: documentroutersettings_routerowners_instructions
data.value: Enter users or groups separated by semicolons:

data.name: documentroutersettings_routerowners_emailforproblemscheckbox
data.value: E-mail rule managers when submissions do not match a rule

data.name: documentroutersettings_routerowners_emailforstalecontentcheckbox
data.value: E-mail rule managers when content has been left in the Drop Off Library

data.name: documentroutersettings_routerowners_daystowait
data.value: Number of days to wait before sending an e-mail:

data.name: documentroutersettings_routerdetails_description
data.value: Use this information to set up other sites or e-mail messaging software to send content to this site.

data.name: documentroutersettings_auditlogandproperties_description
data.value: The organizer can save the original audit logs and properties if they are included with submissions. The saved logs and properties are stored in an audit entry on the submitted document.

data.name: documentroutersettings_auditlogandproperties_savepropscheckbox
data.value: Save the original audit log and properties of submitted content

data.name: documentroutersettings_enforcerouting_description
data.value:
When this setting is enabled, users are redirected to the Drop Off Library when they try to upload content to libraries in this site that have one or more content organizer rules pointing to them.
If this setting is disabled, users can always bypass the organizer and upload files directly to a library or folder.

Users will never be redirected to the Drop Off Library when organizing pages.

data.name: documentroutersettings_enforcerouting_enablecheckbox
data.value: Require users to use the organizer when submitting new content to libraries with one or more organizer rules pointing to them

data.name: documentroutersettings_enforcerouting_title
data.value: Redirect Users to the Drop Off Library

data.name: contenttypepolicynameerror
data.value: Please enter a name for the policy

data.name: basecontenttypeWarning
data.value: An expiration schedule set on the Document or Item content type cannot be based off of a system generated property such as Date Created or Date Modified. To use a system generated property, create a new content type that is derived from the Document or Item content types

data.name: documentroutersettings_autofolder_description
data.value: The organizer can automatically create subfolders once a target location exceeds a certain size.

data.name: documentroutersettings_autofolder_enabletitle
data.value: Create subfolders after a target location has too many items

data.name: documentroutersettings_autofolder_maxcapacity
data.value: Number of items in a single folder:

data.name: documentroutersettings_autofolder_postinfo
data.value: %1 is replaced by the date and time the folder is created.

data.name: recordkeepingsettings_pagedescription
data.value: Documents or items declared as records can have additional restrictions or retention policies enforced on them compared to non-records. Use this page to determine who can declare records and what restrictions to put in place. You can also use the information management settings on a location or a content type to define separate policies for records and non-records.

data.name: recordkeepingsettings_recordbehavior_description
data.value: Specify restrictions to place on a document or item once it has been declared as a record. Changing this setting will not affect items which have already been declared records. Note: The information management policy settings can also specify different policies for records and non-records.

data.name: recordkeepingsettings_recordbehavior_fyibuttondescription
data.value: Records are no more restricted than non-records.

data.name: recordkeepingsettings_recordbehavior_nodeletebuttondescription
data.value: Records can be edited but not deleted.

data.name: recordkeepingsettings_recordbehavior_nodeleteordeletebuttondescription
data.value: Records cannot be edited or deleted. Any changes will require the record declaration to be revoked.

data.name: recordkeepingsettings_locations_description
data.value: Specify whether all lists and libraries in this site should make the manual declaration of records available by default. When manual record declaration is unavailable, records can only be declared through a policy or workflow.

data.name: recordkeepingsettings_locations_manualdescription
data.value: Manual record declaration in lists and libraries should be:

data.name: recordkeepingsettings_locations_manualyesbutton
data.value: Available in all locations by default

data.name: recordkeepingsettings_locations_manualnobutton
data.value: Not available in all locations by default

data.name: recordkeepingsettings_permissions_description
data.value: Specify which user roles can declare and undeclare record status manually.

data.name: recordkeepingsettings_permissions_declarebydescription
data.value: The declaration of records can be performed by:

data.name: CSH_AuditLogTrimming
data.value: Learn more about audit log trimming.

data.name: recordkeepingsettings_permissions_undeclarebydescription
data.value: Undeclaring a record can be performed by:

data.name: searchandaddtohold_page_description
data.value: Use this page to discover content related to a particular litigation, investigation, or audit. Each search result can be added to a hold so that it can be properly retained. Alternatively, the results can be sent to another site, such as a Records Center.

data.name: searchandaddtohold_searchcriteria_description_part1
data.value: Specify the site that you want to search and the search terms related to the hold.

data.name: searchandaddtohold_searchcriteria_description_part2
data.value: You can specify complex searches using the keyword syntax.

data.name: searchandaddtohold_searchcriteria_claw_clawsearch_text
data.value: Specify whether to search the entire subscription or just this site:

data.name: searchandaddtohold_searchcriteria_claw_clawsearch_radio
data.value: Search all the site collections in this site's subscription

data.name: searchandaddtohold_searchcriteria_claw_noclawsearch_radio
data.value: Search a specific site within this site:

data.name: searchandaddtohold_searchcriteria_entersearchterms
data.value: Enter one or more search terms into the box below:

data.name: searchandaddtohold_localorexport_description_part1
data.value: If your organization's policy allows this repository to store held content, you can keep the relevant content in place. Otherwise, documents can be copied to another repository.

data.name: searchandaddtohold_localorexport_description_part2
data.value: The destination location list is populated with all valid Document and Records Center locations as configured by the administrator.

data.name: searchandaddtohold_localorexport_selectaction
data.value: Select the action to perform on the search results:

data.name: searchandaddtohold_localorexport_keepinplace_radio
data.value: Keep in place and add to hold directly.

data.name: searchandaddtohold_localorexport_export_radio
data.value: Copy to another location and add the copy to a hold.

data.name: searchandaddtohold_relevanthold_description
data.value: Specify the hold that the items should be subject to. If the items will be kept in place, this list is populated based upon the holds defined for this site and all parent sites. Otherwise, the list is populated with the valid holds for the destination location selected above.

data.name: searchandaddtohold_relevanthold_viewmodifyholds_linktext
data.value: Open this site's hold list in a new window

data.name: searchandaddtohold_errors_invalidsearchlocation
data.value: The search location must specify the URL to this site or a subsite within this site.

data.name: searchandaddtohold_errors_nopermissiontotargetsite
data.value: You don not have access to any holds in this remote location.

data.name: searchandaddtohold_errors_noholdsavailable
data.value: There are no valid holds defined.

data.name: ediscoverysubscriptionhub_description
data.value: Use this page to configure discovery and hold settings for this subscription

data.name: ediscoverysubscriptionhub_multisitecollectionrepository_description_part1
data.value: Document and Records Centers can often times be too big for one site collection. If this subscription was created to band multiple site collections together into a single repository, enable this setting. This will allow one centralized hold list, report library, and search page for the entire subscription.

data.name: ediscoverysubscriptionhub_multisitecollectionrepository_description_part2
data.value: You are required to specify a search scope that corresponds to the repository. This will allow the preview of your discovery search to be scoped to only the site collections in the repository.

data.name: ediscoverysubscriptionhub_enablediscoveryacrosssubscription_checkboxtext
data.value: Enable discovery across the entire subscription

data.name: ErrorSecurityValidationFailed
data.value: The security validation for this page is invalid and might be corrupted. Please use your web browser's Back button to try your operation again.

data.name: uploadex_target_location_description
data.value: Specify the folder in this document library where the document should be saved.

data.name: uploadex_submit_description
data.value: Browse to the document you intend to submit.

data.name: uploadex_document_submit_warning
data.value: Documents uploaded here are automatically moved to the correct library and folder after document properties are collected.

data.name: uploadex_invalid_location
data.value: The selected location does not exist in this document library.

data.name: recordscenterconsole_desc
data.value: Use this page to create a file plan and configure records management settings for the repository.

data.name: recordkeepinglistsettings_pagedescription
data.value: Individual lists and libraries can allow or disallow the manual creation of records, as well as declare all items as records as they are added.

data.name: recordkeepinglistsettings_manualdeclare_description
data.value: Specify whether this list should allow the manual declaration of records. When manual record declaration is unavailable, records can only be declared through a policy or workflow.

data.name: recordkeepinglistsettings_manualdeclare_sitedefaultbutton
data.value: Use the site collection default setting:

data.name: recordkeepinglistsettings_manualdeclare_sitedefaultbuttonpositive
data.value: Allow the manual declaration of records

data.name: recordkeepinglistsettings_manualdeclare_sitedefaultbuttonnegative
data.value: Do not allow the manual declaration of records

data.name: recordkeepinglistsettings_manualdeclare_allowmanualbutton
data.value: Always allow the manual declaration of records

data.name: recordkeepinglistsettings_manualdeclare_disallowmanualbutton
data.value: Never allow the manual declaration of records

data.name: recordkeepinglistsettings_autodeclaration_description
data.value: Specify whether all items should become records when added to this list.

data.name: recordkeepinglistsettings_autodeclaration_checkBoxText
data.value: Automatically declare items as records when they are added to this list.

data.name: recordkeepinglistsettings_autodeclaration_reqCheckOutWarning
data.value: Items will be declared a record after the first check in of the item. When automatic declaration of items is enabled, checkout will also be required on this list before items can be edited.

data.name: routermessage_missingproperties_warning
data.value: Before this document can be routed to the final location, any required properties must be filled out.

data.name: documentroutersettings_enablecrossrouting_description
data.value: If there are too many items to fit into one site collection, enable this setting to distribute content to other sites that also have content organizers.

data.name: documentroutersettings_enablecrossrouting_enablecheckbox
data.value: Allow rules to specify another site as a target location

data.name: uploadex_file_assetlib_warning
data.value: Assets in this format cannot be played by the Media Player Web Part. The following media formats can be played by the Media Player Web Part: Windows Media Audio (WMA), Windows Media Video (WMV), ISO/MPEG Layer-3 (MP3).

data.name: manage_folder_retention_schedule
data.value: Manage the retention schedule for items in this folder

data.name: feature_not_applicable_to_virtual_list
data.value: This feature is not supported for external lists.

data.name: restricted_to_web_error
data.value: Cannot restrict the report to the selected list. The list name is invalid.
